channel.title: Presentation 1 :: CIS 598 Textbook
channel.description: During the first half of the semester, each student will be scheduled to give a Overview & Requirements Presentation related to the project. Presentation Outline The presentation should be roughly 8 minutes in length, and cover the following topics: A brief overview of the project. NEW A small set (2-3) of top level use cases for the project. These use cases should clearly lead to the requirements in the next bullet point.
